19917.en: <start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>Copello! We're going out. Quickly, come on!!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19917.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「コペロー！　私たちは　外に行くわよ。
　早く　いらっしゃい！！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19917.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>: 코페로! 우린 나가야 해.
　빨리 와!!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19917.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>科佩罗！我们可要出去了。
你也快点来！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19917.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>科佩羅！我們要出去囉。
你快過來！！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19918.en: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>I get it, mom.<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19918.ja: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>「わかってるってー　かーちゃん。<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19918.ko: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>: 알았다니까, 엄마.<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19918.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>知道了，妈妈。<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19918.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>我知道啦──媽媽。<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19919.en:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>Well then, Copello and I are going. I'll leave the
rest to you.<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19919.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　私とコペローは　家を空けるわ。
　後は　あなたに　まかせたわよ。<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19919.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>: 그럼 나랑 코페로는 나가 있을게.
　뒷일을 부탁해.<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19919.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>那我和科佩罗就出门去了。
之后的事就拜托你喽。<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19919.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>那我和科佩羅出門囉。
之後的事就拜託你了。<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19926.en: You can't overlook such a crime, it's unthinkable!
19926.ja: 犯罪を見逃すなんて　とんでもない！
19926.ko: 범죄를 못 본 척하다니 말도 안 된다!

19927.en: Do you want to catch the cat monster?<yesno><close>
19927.ja: ネコの魔物を　捕まえますか？<yesno><close>

19929.en:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>What seems to be the commotion, could it be the

19930.en: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>Ahh, it's a cat. A kitty cat.<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19930.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00473 _normal m00001>啊──是貓──是貓貓──<stop_lip_animation n00473 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27190.en: <start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>EEECK! A CAT MONSTER!?<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27190.ko: <start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>: 꺄아악! 고양이 마물!?<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27191.en: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>I beg you, I does. Please overlook this, won't yooou!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27191.ja: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「後生でヤンス。見逃してくれでヤンスーーー！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27191.ko: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 제발 부탁드림다. 한 번만 봐주십쇼~~!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27191.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>上天有好生之德，求求你饶了我吧——！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27191.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>上天有好生之德，求求你饒了我吧──！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19932.en:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>...No good, it's already settled, don't you know?
I'm punishing you!!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19932.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「……ダメに　決まってるでしょう？
　お仕置きしてあげるわ！！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

看我來收拾你！！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19933.ja: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「ミャギャーーー！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19934.ja: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「捕まるわけには　いかねえんでヤンス……。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19934.ko: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 여기서 잡힐 수는 없슴다…….<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19934.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>才不让你抓到呢……<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19934.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>我可不能被抓……<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19935.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>At the cabin on King Ladis Island, my boss is waiting
on me with an empty belly, he is!!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19935.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「アッシにゃあ　ラーディス王島の小屋で
　ハラを空かせて　待っている旦那が
　いるんでえヤンスーーー！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19935.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 제겐 라디스 왕의 섬의 오두막에서
　주린 배를 안고 기다리시는
　나리가 계심다~~~!!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19935.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>大哥还在拉迪斯王岛的
小屋里饿着肚子
等我回去呢！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19935.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>大哥還在拉迪斯王島的
小屋裡餓著肚子
等我回去呢────！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19936.en:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>Since you weren't quick enough to catch him, he got
away!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19936.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「あなたが　さっさと　捕まえてくれないから
　逃げられちゃったじゃない！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19936.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>: 당신이 우물쭈물하는 바람에
　놓쳤잖아!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19936.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>都是因为你犹犹豫豫的
才让那家伙逃掉了！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19936.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>都是因為你沒有立刻抓牠，
被那傢伙給逃了啦！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19937.en:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>...If that's the case, then you have no choice but
to go in my stead to the cabin on King Ladis Island.<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19937.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「……こうなったら　私の代わりに
　あなたに　ラーディス王島の小屋まで
　行ってもらうしかないわね。<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19937.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>: ……이렇게 된 이상 당신이
　나 대신 라디스 왕의 섬의 오두막에

19937.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>……既然这样，只能由你
代替我去拉迪斯王岛的小屋
走一趟了。<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19937.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>……既然這樣，只能由你
代替我去拉迪斯王島的小屋
走一趟了。<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19938.en:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>South of town to Muse Coast and further south from
there is a canoe that goes to King Ladis Island. Go
punish that cat monster!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19938.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「町の南側から　ミューズ海岸に出て　さらに南に
　ラーディス王島行きの　カヌー乗り場があるわ。
　あのネコの魔物に　お仕置きしてきて！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19938.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>: 마을 남쪽 뮤즈 해안으로 나가 남쪽으로 가면
　라디스 왕의 섬행 카누 선착장이 있어.
　그 녀석한테 따끔한 맛을 보여 주도록 해!<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19938.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>从村子南边可以到达缪兹海岸，
再往南走有去往拉迪斯王岛的独木舟码头。
你去教训一下那只猫妖吧！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19938.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>從市鎮南邊可以到達繆茲海岸，
再往南走有前往拉迪斯王島的獨木舟碼頭。
你去教訓一下那隻貓妖吧！<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

114406.en:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>Come to think of it, just outside town, the merchant's
wagon goes to King Ladis Island too. It'd be easier
using that, wouldn't it?<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
114406.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>「そう言えば　町の外にいる商人さんの馬車が
　ラーディス王島にも　行くようになったそうよ。
　それを使えば　楽なんじゃないかしら？<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
114406.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>: 그러고 보니 마을 밖에 있는 상인의 마차가
　이제 라디스 왕의 섬에도 간다고 들었어.
　그걸 이용하면 편하게 갈 수 있지 않을까?<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
114406.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>说起来，镇子外面商人的马车
好像也要去拉迪斯王岛。
坐车去的话会比较轻松吧？<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>
114406.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00474 _normal m00001>說起來，市鎮外頭的商人馬車
好像也要去拉迪斯王島。
坐車去應該會比較輕鬆吧？<stop_lip_animation n00474 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28065.en: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Boss... I brought you some food, I did.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28065.ja: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「旦那……。食べ物を　持ってきたでヤンス。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28065.ko: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 나리……. 먹을 걸 가져왔슴다.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28065.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>大哥……我给你拿吃的来了。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28065.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>大哥……我給你拿吃的來了。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28066.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>I hope this food will restore your health, even if

28066.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「これを食べて　すこしでも

28066.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 이걸 드시고 조금이라도

28066.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>你好歹吃点东西，
恢复一下体力吧。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28066.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>你好歹吃點東西，

28067.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>MROW! I didn't think you would follow me this far,
I didn't!!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28067.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「ミャギャッ！　ここまで　追ってくるとは
　思わなかったでヤンス！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28067.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 먀악! 설마
　여기까지 따라올 줄은 몰랐슴다!!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28067.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>喵嘎！竟然一路纠缠

28067.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>喵嘎！竟然一路糾纏
追到這裡來了！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28068.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>If you're to catch me, you'd better quit it, you
should!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28068.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「アッシを　捕まえようってんなら
　やめといたほうが　いいでヤンスよ！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28068.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 절 붙잡을 생각이라면
　포기하는 게 좋을 검다!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28068.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>想抓我的话，
劝你还是省省吧！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28068.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>想抓我的話，
勸你還是省省吧！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28069.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>This is the most powerful swordsman in the cat tribe
world, Master Cat Rebelio, it is!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28069.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「こちらは　猫魔族界　最強の剣豪と名高い
　キャット・リベリオさまでヤンス！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28069.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 이쪽은 고양이 마족계 최강의 검호로
　명성이 자자한 캣 리벨리오 님이심다!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28069.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>这位可是猫妖界鼎鼎有名的
最强剑豪，叛逆猫大人！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28069.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>這位可是貓魔族界鼎鼎有名的
最強劍豪，叛逆貓大人！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28070.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>And I've got nothing to hide; I am his #1 henchman,
Myarji, I am!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28070.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「そして　何を隠そう　アッシは
　そのイチの子分　ミャルジさまなのでヤンス！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28070.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 그리고 무엇을 숨기랴!
　전 그 제일가는 충복 먀루지 님임다!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28070.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>而你面前的喵尔吉大爷我呢，实不相瞒，
可是他最得力的小弟哦！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28070.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>而喵爾吉大爺我呢，實不相瞞，
可是他最得力的小弟喔！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28071.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>If you don't get out of here quickly, I'll show you
the pain, I will!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28071.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「早く出ていかねえと
　痛い目を　見ちまうでヤンスよ！？<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28071.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 당장 나가지 않으면
　호된 꼴을 보게 될 검다!?<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28071.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>你不识相点走人的话，
小心大爷让你吃不了兜着走！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28071.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>你不識相點走人的話，
小心大爺讓你吃不完兜著走喔！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28072.en: <start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>Wait right meow...<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28072.ja: <start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「待てニャ……。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28073.en: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Meowmeow...? What's up, Boss Rebelio.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28073.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「ミャミャ……？
　どうしたでヤンスか　リベリオの旦那。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28073.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 먀먀……?
　왜 그러심까, 리벨리오 나리.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28073.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>喵喵……
叛逆猫大哥，怎么了？<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28073.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>喵喵……
叛逆貓大哥，怎麼了？<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28074.en:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>...This is the bastard who beat me, meow. Their name,
if I remember right is... <pc>...<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28074.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「……コヤツは　オレを倒したヤツだニャ。
　名は　たしか……　<pc>……。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28074.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: ……이 녀석은 날 쓰러뜨렸던 녀석이다냥.
　이름이 분명히…… {pc}|hpp(이었,였)다냥…….<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28074.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>……这家伙，就是打败我的人喵。
他好像叫……<pc>吧……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28074.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>……這傢伙，就是打敗我的人喵。
他好像叫……<pc>吧……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28075.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>MROOOW! You defeated Boss Rebelio!? Then that means,
you saved Momma's son...<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28075.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「ミャギィッ！　リベリオの旦那を倒した！？
　それじゃ　マンマーさまの息子を
　助けたっていう……。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28075.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 먀악! 리벨리오 나리를 쓰러뜨렸다굽쇼!?
　그럼 맘마 님의 아드님을 구했다는 게…….<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28075.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>喵呜！他打败了叛逆猫大哥？！
这么说，就是他救了
曼玛陛下的儿子……？<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28075.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>喵嗚！他打敗了叛逆貓大哥！？
這麼說，就是他救了
女王貓陛下的兒子……？<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28076.en: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Meow then, your revenge is here, it is, Boss Rebelio!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28076.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「それミャあ　ここで　リベンジと
　いくでヤンスか　リベリオの旦那！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28076.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 그러면 이참에 복수하시겠슴까?
　리벨리오 나리!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28076.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>那这次就是复仇的好机会，
叛逆猫大哥！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28076.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>那這次就是復仇的好機會啦，
叛逆貓大哥！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28077.en:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>...Revenge and all that is a bother, meow. Anyways,
it's fine meow...<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28077.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「……リベンジとか　めんどくさいニャ。
　もう　どうでも　いいのニャ……。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28077.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: ……복수고 뭐고 다 귀찮다냥.
　이제 그런 건 됐다냥…….<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28077.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>……复仇什么的麻烦死了喵，
已经无所谓了喵……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28077.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>……復仇什麼的麻煩死了喵，
已經無所謂了喵……<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28078.ja: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「リベリオの旦那……。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28078.ko: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 리벨리오 나리…….<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28079.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>I apologize, I do! For being a cat-burglar like that,
I apologize, I does!!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28079.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「申し訳ありませんでヤンした！
　アッシが　盗みをはたらいたことは
　このとおり　あやまるでヤンス！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28079.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 죄송함다!
　음식을 훔친 건 사과드리겠슴다!!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28079.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>真的非常抱歉！
我为偷东西的事
向你道歉！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28079.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>真的非常抱歉！
我為偷東西的事
向你道歉！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28080.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>...Truthfully, Boss Rebelio completely lost his
motivation, he did.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28080.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「……じつは　リベリオの旦那は
　やる気ってものを　なくしちまって
　ごらんの有り様なんでヤンス。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28080.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: ……보시다시피 리벨리오 나리는
　만사에 의욕을 잃어서
　이렇게 축 늘어져 계심다.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28080.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>……你也看到了，
叛逆猫大哥现在这副德性，
一点干劲也没有。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28080.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>……你也看到了，
叛逆貓大哥現在這副德性，
一點幹勁也沒有。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28081.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>I have to take care of them. I'll take
whatever punishment you want, and I
hope you'll let me off the hook!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28081.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「アッシが　面倒を見ねえと　いかんのでヤンス。
　お仕置きなら　なんでも受けるんで
　それで　ゆるしてほしいのでヤンス！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28081.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 제가 나리를 돌봐드려야 함다.
　어떤 벌이든 달게 받을 테니
　제발 용서해 주십쇼!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28081.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>我不照顾他怎么行啊。
你要处罚，就尽管处罚我吧，
希望这样能让你出口气！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28081.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>我不照顧他怎麼行啊。
你要處罰，就儘管處罰我吧，
希望這樣能讓你出口氣！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28082.en: Do you want to punish Myarji?<yesno><close>
28082.ja: ミャルジに　お仕置きをしますか？<yesno><close>

28085.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Thanks, mrow. I swear I'll never steal again, I won't!
Now, punish me, please!!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28085.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「ありがとミャー。
　もう盗みはしねえと　誓うでヤンスよ！
　さあ　お仕置きを　どうぞ！！　　<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28085.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 고맙슴다.
　이제 다시는 도둑질하지 않겠슴다!
　자, 어서 벌을 내려 주십쇼!!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28085.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>感谢你喵。
我向你发誓，我再也不偷东西了！
请处罚我吧！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28085.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>感謝你喵。
我向你發誓，我再也不偷東西了！
請你處罰我吧！！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28086.ja: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「ミャギャーーーーーー！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28083.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>MROW! That's no good, it is. If I don't get properly
punished, I won't be absolved of my sins, I won't!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28083.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「ミャ！　それじゃあ　ダメでヤンス。
　きっちり　お仕置きを受けねえと
　罪をつぐなったことに　ならねえでヤンス！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28083.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 먀! 그럼 안 됨다.
　벌을 받지 않으면
　죗값을 치른 게 아니지 않슴까!<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28083.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>喵！这可不行。
不让我接受处罚的话，
我就无法好好赎罪了！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28083.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>喵！這可不行。
不讓我接受處罰的話，
我就無法好好贖罪了！<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28084.en: Do you want to punish Myarji?<yesno><close>
28084.ja: ミャルジに　お仕置きをしますか？<yesno><close>

28087.en: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>It worked, it did...<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28087.ja: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「効いたでヤンス……。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28087.ko: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 엄청나게 아픔다…….<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28087.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>好厉害的处罚……<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28087.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>好厲害的處罰……<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28088.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Now I'm forgiven, I am, right. I thank you, I does,
<pc>.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28088.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「これで　ゆるしてもらえたでヤンスよね。
　ありがとうでヤンス　<pc>さま。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28088.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 이제 용서해 주시는 검까?
　감사함다, <pc> 님.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28088.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>这样您就原谅我了吧。
感谢您，<pc>大人。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28088.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>這樣您就原諒我了吧。
感謝您，<pc>大人。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28089.en:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>...My belly's shrinking. Myarji, get me some food
for me, meow.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28089.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>「……ハラが減ったニャー。ミャルジよ。
　食い物を　用意してくれニャ。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28089.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>: ……배가 고프다냥, 먀루지.
　먹을 걸 구해 와라냥.<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28089.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>……肚子饿了喵。喵尔吉，
去给我找食物来。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28089.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50016 _normal m00001>……肚子餓了喵。喵爾吉，
去幫我找食物來。<stop_lip_animation m50016 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28090.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Meow apologies, Boss Rebelio. I just swore I wouldn't
steal, so I have to hunt for food, I does.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28090.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「すみミャせん　リベリオの旦那。
　たった今　盗みはしないと誓ったんで
　食い物は　獲物を狩るしかねえでヤンスよ。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28090.ko:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>: 죄송함다, 리벨리오 나리.
　방금 다시는 도둑질하지 않겠다고 맹세해서
　먹을 걸 구하려면 사냥하는 수밖에 없슴다.<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28090.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>抱歉啊，叛逆猫大哥，
我才发誓再也不会偷东西，
所以要吃东西的话，我们只能去打猎。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28090.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>抱歉啊，叛逆貓大哥，
我才發誓再也不會偷東西，
所以要吃東西的話，我們只能去打獵。<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28091.en:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>Boss Rebelio, you should go too, you should. If you
don't move your body a little, you'll become a fat cat,
you will...<stop_lip_animation m00501 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28091.ja:
<start_lip_sync m00501 _normal m00001><pipipi_shigh>「リベリオの旦那も　行きましょうでヤンス。
　すこしは　身体を動かさないと
